text: He hamro palanahara! Maile aphna kehi santana yasa gaira abadi bhumima timro asima dayayukta ghara (ka'aîba) najika basaleko chu, he hamro palanahara! Yo yasakarana, ki tiniharu namajala'i nirantarata de'un. Tasartha timile kehi mancheharuka hrdayala'i utatarpha akrsta garide'u, ra uniharula'i phalaharuko bhojana dine krpa gara, jasabata tiniharu timro stuti garun
